pages.text: $(li)The End Midlands is a biome composed of the outer islands of the End, forming the gradual slope from the hilltops of each island down to the cliffs around the edge.$(br)$(li)In this Biome you can find $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/enderman)Endermen$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:creatures/alexsmobs/spectre)Spectre$(/l).
$(li)You can search this biome by typing the words $(l)End Midlands$() in the search box of the $(l:patchouli:perks/natures_compass)Nature's Compass$(/l).
